GW_Plugins_Delete_Message: BEN JE ZEKER DAT JE DEZE PLUGIN WIL VERWIJDEREN?
GW_Tools_subTitle: Gateway bied u meer controle aan ! (only available displayed)
GW_Tools_Webview_Header: Modify electron Options for using properly with EXT plugins
GW_Setting_Info_Donate_Text: Gewoon een kleine Koffie... om beter te programmeren!
GW_Restart: Herstart MagicMirror op de nieuwe configuratie in te laden!
EXT-Alert: Toont elke waarschuwing, info of fout op je scherm.
EXT-Background: Verander de Google Assistant achtergrond naar uw keuze met geanimeerde gif's voor elke status van de assistent.
EXT-Browser: Toon elke internet pagina zoals een echte browser in volledige schermweergave.
EXT-Detector: Multi-keyword listener voor uw MMM-GoogleAssistant v4
EXT-FreeboxTV: Toon TV-kanaal van Franse Internet Provider: Gratis
EXT-GooglePhotos: Laat uw Google Photos map zien als achtergrond op basis van de API op uw MagicMirror.
EXT-Governor: CPU governor geeft u de mogelijkheid om de CPU snelheid te veranderen om energie te besparen of om aan rekenkracht te winnen.
EXT-Internet: Controleert uw internet verbinding en toont uw ping snelheid op uw scherm.
EXT-Librespot: Laat toe om Spotify muziek af te spelen op uw MagicMirror aan de hand van Librespot.
EXT-MusicPlayer: Speel muziek vanaf een bestandsmap of vanaf een USB-stick.
EXT-Photos: Vertoont alle foto's gevonden door de Google Assistant
EXT-Pir: Schakel uw scherm dmv een bewegingsdetector.
EXT-RadioPlayer: Speel een radiostation af op uw MagicMirror.
EXT-Raspotify: Speel Spotify muziek af op uw MagicMirror met Raspotify.
EXT-Screen: Na een bepaalde tijd en zonder tussenkomst van de gebruiker uw scherm en alle modules uitschakelen in een energie besparende modus.
EXT-ScreenManager: Automatisch aan en uitschakelen van uw scherm dmv vooraf ingestelde uren.
EXT-ScreenTouch: Aan en uitschakelen van uw dcherm dmv een aanraakscherm.
EXT-Spotify: Deze plugin laat zien welk lied er door spotify afgespeeld word.
EXT-UpdateNotification: Deze plugin geeft weer wat er dient geupdate te worden (of doet het automatisch).
EXT-Volume: Beheer het volume van uw MagicMirror.
EXT-Welcome: Laat toe om een Welkom's boodschap te tonen bij de start van uw MagicMirror.
EXT-YouTube: Deze plugin laat het toe om YouTube video's af te spelen (enkel mogelijk mits betaling).
EXT-YouTubeCast: Laat toe om YouTube video's te casten op uw MagicMirror.
EXT-YouTubeVLC: Laat het toe om YouTube video's in volledige schermweergave te tonen op uw MagicMirror met VLC media player.
VAL_PluginConfigDeepMerge: Automatically merge with the default configuration if a feature is missing in the configuration
VAL_EXT-Background_Image: Kies zelf een afbeelding, als je geen model wilt
VAL_EXT-Bring_List: Wat is de naam van je lijst in Bring!
VAL_EXT-Bring_Email: Uw emailadres van uw Bring! account?
VAL_EXT-Bring_Password: Uw wachtwoord van uw Bring! account?
VAL_EXT-Bring_Colums: Het aantal kolommen in uw weergave
VAL_EXT-Bring_Rows: THet maximum aantal rijen dat vertoont word in uw weergave
VAL_EXT-Bring_Background: Uw items met een achtergrond vertonen
VAL_EXT-Bring_Header: Toon de naam van uw boodschappenlijst in de hoofding van de plugin
VAL_EXT-Browser_Delay: Delay before closing the browser automaticaly in ms. If you want to disable this delay, set it to 0 (default is 60 secs)
VAL_EXT-Browser_Step: Scrolling step in px for scrolling down
VAL_EXT-Browser_Start: Delay before scrolling down in ms (after url loaded)
VAL_EXT-Detector_Icon: Display Google Icon and animate it when keyword discover
VAL_EXT-Detector_Touch: Activate MMM-GoogleAssistant by Touch the Google Icon only and don't listen any keywords
VAL_EXT-Detector_Sensitivity: Sensitivity of detection of the keyword
VAL_EXT-GooglePhotos_Type: How displaying Google Photos? (0: in Fullscreen, 1: in MagicMirror position)
VAL_EXT-GooglePhotos_Delay: Delay before displaying next photo in the iframe (default is 10 secs)
VAL_EXT-GooglePhotos_Infos: Displaying name of the album and photo time
VAL_EXT-GooglePhotos_Albums: Album Folders names of Google Photos to display
VAL_EXT-GooglePhotos_Sort: Sort received google photos new, old, random
VAL_EXT-Governor_Sleep: Name of the governor when screen is in sleeping state
VAL_EXT-Governor_Work: Name of the governor when screen is actived
VAL_EXT-Internet_Ping: Display the ping value on the screen
VAL_EXT-Internet_Delay: Set the interval for internet checking (in ms)
VAL_EXT-Internet_Command: Command which will be executed after the internet connection is detected as lost
VAL_EXT-Internet_Alert: Show or not the Alert about internet connection lost (EXT-Alert needed)
VAL_EXT-Internet_Restart: Restart your MagicMirror app with your prefered command
VAL_EXT-Librespot_Min: Volume to set when assistant speaking (in %)
VAL_EXT-MusicPlayer_USB: If you prefer play file from an USB Key, set it to true
VAL_EXT-MusicPlayer_Path: Music path for playing music from Local Files
VAL_EXT-MusicPlayer_Check: Should this module inspect sub directory for create music list ?
VAL_EXT-MusicPlayer_Start: AutoStart USB key Music at boot of MagicMirror or when USB key is plugged in
VAL_EXT-MusicPlayer_Min: Volume to set when assistant speaking (in %)
VAL_EXT-MusicPlayer_Max: Volume to set when music playing (in %)
VAL_EXT-Photos_Delay: Delay before change photo automaticaly in ms. (default is 20 secs)
VAL_EXT-Photos_Loop: Make a loop on all photos
VAL_EXT-RadioPlayer_Min: Volume to set when assistant speaking (in %)
VAL_EXT-RadioPlayer_Max: Volume to set when radio playing (in %)
VAL_EXT-Raspotify_Card: Define the playing device card (see wiki page)
VAL_EXT-Screen_Body: Animate MagicMirror on turn on/off the screen
VAL_EXT-Screen_Delay: Time before the mirror turns off the display if no user activity is detected. (in ms)
VAL_EXT-Screen_Display: Should the display turn off after timeout?
VAL_EXT-Screen_Mode: mode for turn on/off your screen (see wiki)
VAL_EXT-Screen_Eco: Should the MagicMirror hide all module after timeout ?
VAL_EXT-Screen_Bar: Should display Count-up bar in screen ?
VAL_EXT-Screen_Presence: Display the date of the last user presence
VAL_EXT-Screen_Date: Change the date format (moment.js format) of the last presence
VAL_EXT-Screen_Sleeping: Activate ONLY EXT-Detector only when display is on
VAL_EXT-Screen_Hide: Auto Hide this module when the lock function is activated
VAL_EXT-Screen_Delayed: Delayed turn on screen time (only if your screen is off). (in ms)
VAL_EXT-Screen_GPIO: GPIO number for control the relay (mode 6 only)
VAL_EXT-Screen_Reset: Reset GPIO value script of relay (mode 6 only)
VAL_EXT-ScreenManager_Lock: Force to lock the screen counter and disable it
VAL_EXT-ScreenTouch_Mode: Selected mode for enable/disable the screen with touch (see wiki)
VAL_EXT-Spotify_Interval: Update interval when playing (refresh) in ms
VAL_EXT-Spotify_Idle: Update interval when idle (check if Spotify active) in ms
VAL_EXT-Spotify_BottomBar: Activate visual of the current playback in the bottom bar
VAL_EXT-Spotify_ID: Client ID of your Spotify account
VAL_EXT-Spotify_Secret: Client Secret of your Spotify account
VAL_EXT-UpdateNotification_Interval: Interval for update checking in ms. (default: 10 mins)
VAL_EXT-UpdateNotification_Delay: Delay before starting first scan (default : 60 secs)
VAL_EXT-UpdateNotification_Commands: Update commands for each module with an array of module/command object
VAL_EXT-UpdateNotification_Notification: How can this plugin can notify
VAL_EXT-UpdateNotification_Ready: Send a welcome and initialized confirmation on start
VAL_EXT-UpdateNotification_Callback: Send any callback process to telegramBot?
VAL_EXT-UpdateNotification_Update: How can this plugin can update modules and plugin
VAL_EXT-UpdateNotification_AutoUpdate: If you want an automated update process, just activate it!
VAL_EXT-UpdateNotification_PM2: Name or ID of the MagicMirror process in PM2
VAL_EXT-UpdateNotification_DefaultComman: Define your default update command. It is being used if there is no individual command for the module in the updateCommands array.
VAL_EXT-UpdateNotification_Log: This feature is needed for user who don't use PM2 ! Log process and result in console
VAL_EXT-UpdateNotification_Timeout: Maximum execution time of an update in ms (default: 2 mins)
VAL_EXT-YouTube_Width: Width of the your YouTube window (can be a px value too)
VAL_EXT-YouTube_Height: Height of the your YouTube window (can be a px value too)
VAL_EXT-YouTube_Display: Should the YouTube windows have to be always displayed when a video is not playing ?
VAL_EXT-YouTube_Header: Display a few seconds in popup the title found of the video (needed EXT-Alert)
VAL_EXT-YouTube_Token: The token associated to your usernane (sended by @bugsounet)
VAL_EXT-YouTubeCast_Name: Name of the MagicMirror cast device
VAL_EXT-YouTubeCast_Port: Port of the MagicMirror cast device
VAL_EXT-YouTubeVLC_Min: Volume to set when assistant speaking (in %)
